name: Concierge Tower Room
description: Premium accommodations with access to the exclusive 25th floor Concierge Lounge featuring complimentary continental breakfast and afternoon hors d'oeuvres. Rooms include custom furnishings, floor-to-ceiling windows, 55-inch HDTV, Bose Wave Radio, premium Wi-Fi, and marble-accented bathrooms with June Jacobs products. Butler service available upon request.
shortDescription: Premium room with exclusive Concierge Lounge access, breakfast, and butler service.

meta.title: Concierge Tower Room – Atlantis Reno | Golf The High Sierra
meta.description: Book the Concierge Tower Room at Atlantis Reno – exclusive lounge access with breakfast, hors d'oeuvres, and butler service.
